title: Bounty Star
author: Bounty Star
created_time: February 12, 2023, 04:00:32 AMLast edit: February 16, 2023, 11:45:15 AM by Bounty Star
content: WEBSITE - WHITEPAPER -   YOUTUBE - TELEGRAM - TWITTER - ANN1. Bounty campaign will be managed by BountyStar.2.  $15000 worth of $BTCF are allocated for this Bounty.3. The bounty program was launched on 12.02.2023 and will run until 25.03.2023Disclaimer: By agreeing to participate in this bounty, you acknowledge that the wallet address and the email address you submitted are final and can't be changed, bounty manager reserves the right to make changes to the conditions at any time.BountyStar team can't assure the project's success as our duty is to provide a bounty management service for them as freelancers. We are responsible only for managing the campaign. We are not responsible for the project's success and continuity. Participating in this bounty campaign or investing in it will be at your own risk.Note: This campaign is escrowed. Distribution of this campaign is guaranteed by BountyStar. (We are holding 300 tokens) 1. All participants must join the Bitcoin Future's official Telegram Group and Channel.2. All participants must join BountyStar's  Telegram Group.3. Talking about the bounty in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign and an instant ban from the company chat group. Please ask your bounty-related questions in the BountyStar's Group.4. KYC is not required for the bounty campaign. However, the project's team has the right to require KYC for suspicious cases.5. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign.6. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed.7. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.Proof Of Registration Post Format: Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Username:Forum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:BSC Wallet Address:  Twitter             30%Telegram          15% YouTube          20%TikTok              15%Article              20%Week 1 (12.02 - 18.02)Week 2 (19.02 - 25.02)Week 3 (26.02 - 04.03)Week 4 (05.03 - 11.03)Week 5 (12.03 - 18.03)Week 6 (19.03 - 25.03)Submit your weekly report on bounty thread.Complaint missing stakes or other problem by complaint form below.Complaint FormComplaint SpreadsheetNote: Complaints will be checked every week.Rewards:  1. Have more than 500 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 3000 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5000 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,000 followers: 5 stakes/weekRules:   1. Every participant must follow Bitcoin Future's Twitter Page.2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 500 followers.3. Participants have to make 2 new tweets and 3 retweets per week (maximum 1 retweet and 1 Tweet per day).4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 12 hours minimum.5. Participants must use @BITCOINF_ $BTCF #Bitcoin Future #CoinTiger #Binance #Gems hashtags in every retweet and tweet.How to join:1. Join the Bitcoin Future's official Telegram Group and Channel.2. All participants must join BountyStar's  Telegram Group.3. Fill the registration form: Rewards:5 stakes/weekRules:   1. Update your Telegram name to "Your Name | BitcoinFuture Fan''. Only one project is allowed in your Telegram name.2. Replace your profile picture with Bitcoin Future's Logo.3. Write at least 2 constructive messages on this group: http://t.me/BITCOIN_FUTURE_GLOBAL and 3 constructive messages weekly in other exchange telegram groups like- Binance, Kucoin, Mexc, GateIO, etc.(Posts/messages must be constructive, useful, and in a way that will not be considered as spamming.)4. Deleted messages will not be counted.5. Report your telegram message links weekly.6. You must wear Bitcoin Future's avatar and text until the end of the campaign.How to join:1. Join the Bitcoin Future's official Telegram Group and Channel.2. All participants must join BountyStar's  Telegram Group.3. Fill the registration form:Rewards:  1. Have more than 100 views: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1000 views: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 5000 views: 4 stakes/week4. Have more than 10,000 views: 5 stakes/week5. Have more than 50,000 views: 10 stakes/weekRules:  1. Participants must have at least 100 Followers.2. Each participant can send 1 video per week.3. Video Content must focus on a relevant topic: project features, Tokensale, latest token updates, blockchain, etc.4. Only original video content will be accepted.5. Bot voices will not be rewarded. But, a good quality animation video with bot voices will be rewarded.6. Poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality.7. Videos should never be removed, Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.8. All videos need to have the project's website'5. Participants must use #BSC #Gems #BTCF hashtags in every video.How to join:1. Join the Bitcoin Future's official Telegram Group and Channel.2. All participants must join BountyStar's  Telegram Group.3. Fill the registration form:Rewards: High quality: 5 stakesGood quality: 3 stakesAverage quality: 1 stakeRules:   1. Newbies with less than 100 activities are not allowed to join this campaign. Articles should be quality and unique with a minimum of 500 words.(Participants who copy the project's website, whitepaper or ANN thread, will not receive rewards).Views and comments at least 10 likes/comments/upvotes or 50 claps would be taken note of.2. Poor quality articles will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on quality.3. Each participant can write 1 article only.4. Articles should be published on blogs recommended by us: Steemit, Medium, and LinkedIn and must be publicly accessible.Other high-ranked blogs may be accepted.5. Content must focus on a relevant topic: project features, Pre Sale, latest token updates, blockchain, etc.6. Articles should never be removed.7. Published Articles must include at least 2 images of the project,   project's website,Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel, or any other social media.8. Please provide a Wallet address and enough details of the writer at the end of the article to ensure athenticity. This will be verified!How to join:1. Join the Bitcoin Future's official Telegram Group and Channel.2. All participants must join BountyStar's  Telegram Group.3. Fill the registration form:Rewards: High quality: 5 stakes Good quality: 3 stakes Average quality: 1 stakeRules:1. Videos must have at least 200+ youtube views. Videos need to be a minimum of 3 minutes in length.2. Each participant can send 1 video only.3. Video Content must focus on a relevant topic: project features, Tokensale, latest token updates, blockchain, etc.4. Only original video content will be accepted.5. Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered. 6. Bot voices will not be rewarded. But, a good quality animation video with bot voices will be rewarded.7. Poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality.8. Videos should never be removed, Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.9. All videos need to have the project's website,Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel, or any other social media.10. Please provide the wallet address and enough details of the producer (bounty hunter) at the end of the video to ensure athenticity. This will be verified!How to join:1. Join the Bitcoin Future's official Telegram Group and Channel.2. All participants must join BountyStar's  Telegram Group.3. Fill the registration form:
